text:
A 30-year-old youth P. Sakthivel was fatally knocked down by a lorry on Thursday. The incident happened at Panamangalam cross road, when the youth was going by his two-wheeler on the Sirkali bypass. The Sirkali police have registered a case and are investigating.

SBI donates tricycles

State Bank of India has donated 10 tricycles and an equal number of stretchers to the Government Hospital here. T. Karikalan, District Collector, handed over the same to the hospital authorities in the presence of bank officials led by Karthikeya Venkateswaran, manager of the bank.

FMD screening

A special camp to check the incidence of foot-and-mouth disease in livestock will be held in the district. In a release issued here on Thursday, K. Latha Mangeshar, Joint Director of Veterinary Health and Animal Welfare, said that the camp would be held from 6 a.m. to 10 p.m. It would be organised from March 18 to 21 at Karaikal and Nedungadu communues; from March 22 to 26 at Tirupattinam and Kottucherry commune panchayats; and from March 28 to 31 in Neravi and Thennankudi commune panchayats. The release advised the livestock owners to utilise the camp for checking the incidence of the disease.
title: Lorry mows down man
